ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of LARRY MURRAY, C.M., of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Chairperson of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of four years, effective May 29, 2019.
